alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 7:41PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HEAVY BAND OF SNOW AFFECTING SOUTHERN MEADE COUNTY... ...BAND MOVING TOWARD INTERSTATE 90 AND THE RAPID CITY AREA... A band of heavy snow is stretching from the Piedmont to Black Hawk area eastward to Elm Springs and Creighton. This east-west band is just north of Pennington County and is moving south. There have been reports of a quick 2 to 4 inches of snow under the band, with snowfall rates around 1 inch an hour. As this band moves over Interstate 90 from Rapid City to Wall, motorists can expect near zero visibility at times and snow quickly accumulating on roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
